llm_res.rule: Returns the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation.
The function `name` should return the name of the token.
llm_res.function: Incorrect implementation of `name` function (returns empty string)

llm_res.rule: Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
